caption.p: The leaf carbon concentration (LCC, %), leaf nitrogen concentration (LNC, %) and leaf carbon-nitrogen ratio (C:N) of the three species under nitrogen treatments. Species: G, Galinsoga quadriradiata; H, Heteropappus hispidus; S, Sonchus oleraceus. Values are means ± SE. Means with the same letter were not significantly different at an alpha level of 0.05.
